title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: People may come to you for your penetrating insight and unconventional advice today. Much of your spiritual wisdom stems from probing questions you are willing to ask of yourself. Being directly in touch with your own passions allows you to sharply pierce into the heart of an issue without fear or awkwardness. However, revealing all the facts too quickly can be difficult for others to assimilate. Some folks might better heed your message if you dole out smaller doses of your perceptive medicine. Your intuition is both a blessing and a curse. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
